import React,{Fragment, useState}from "react" import titles from "../static/css/playdetail.module.css" import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom" import dayjs from "dayjs" import "dayjs/locale/zh-cn" dayjs().locale("zh-cn") export default function DetailTitle(props){ //拿取父组件传递的信息，分离需要信息 let {data} = props let [show,setShow] = useState(false) console.log(data) if(data){ console.log( dayjs(data.createTime)) let dat = dayjs(data.createTime).$d } return( {data?

{data.name}

{data.creator.nickname}   {""}创建
播放
({String(data.playCount).slice(0,4)})
({String(data.shareCount).slice(0,4)})
({String(data.commentCount).slice(0,4)})
标签： {data.tags.map((item,index)=>{ return {item} })}

`).length)<140?("介绍："+(data.description.replace(/\n/g,`
`))):("介绍："+(data.description.replace(/\n/g,`
`).slice(0,140) + "...")) }} style={show?{display:"none"}:{display:"block"}} >

`)) }} style={!show?{display:"none"}:{display:"block"}} >

{(data.description.replace(/\n/g,`
`).length<140)?"":
{ setShow(!show) }}>{show?"收起":"展开"}
